summary: A baby born to a human couple turns out to be a mutant monster with an appetite to kill when scared.
cast: Bijou Phillips|James Murray|Raphaël Coleman|Owen Teale|Ty Glaser|Oliver Coopersmith|Ioan Karamfilov|Jack Ellis|Skye Bennett|Arkie Reece|Todd Jensen|Mariana Stansheva|Alexis Bergemann|Michal Yannai|Gergana Bouzukova|Vlado Mihailov|Meglena Karalambova|Vesco Razpopov|Atanas Srebrev|Michael McCoy|Dimitar Shopov|Violeta Markovska|Sigal Diamant|Douglas A. Reno|Mike Straub|Mark W. Johnson|Sofia Vasileva|Miroslav Emilov|Laura Giosh|Vladimir Koev
title: Está vivo (It's Alive)
